responsibilities.description: Exposure to multiple Python test automation frameworks.
Assist in creating test automation framework from scratch if needed.
Integrate test automation framework with build automation tools (e.g., Jenkins, Github actions).
Review pull requests (PRs) from team members.
Provide appropriate comments and merge code.

discussion7.speaker: Abhishek Pandey
discussion7.message: Once you get onboarded or hired, we'll map you with various clients. Then, there will be a client round, which won't be highly technical. During this discussion, they'll walk you through the project they are working on and discuss the required skill set.

discussion7.speaker: Abhishek Pandey
discussion7.message: We have both long-term and short-term projects. We are language-agnostic. At the lead level, we expect someone to be a solution provider. They should have a good understanding of object-related concepts, various design aspects, and be comfortable working directly with clients. Depending on the project, you might work with a team or as an individual contributor.

discussion7.speaker: Abhishek Pandey
discussion7.message: For example, you might need to create a proof of concept (PoC) by yourself, build a framework, and ensure it works. Alternatively, you could be part of a team that needs organization and support.
